name: Another Dungeon Game
description:
Get Ready for Epic Dungeon Crawling!

Embark on an action-packed 2D RPG adventure with "Another Dungeon Game"! Battle through dungeons filled with randomized loot, over-the-top skills, and extensive passive trees. Designed with casual players in mind, this game offers an accessible and thrilling experience from level 1.

An Action RPG for Everyone!

Millions of players love the thrill that can only be found in the Loot-Driven Action RPG genre, but many of them lack the time or the means to spend countless hours learning the complex mechanics and grinding out the perfect gear. Another Dungeon Game strives to remove the steep learning curves and time sinks found in other games and make the excitement of designing builds and ripping through enemies accessible to as many players as possible, without taking away what makes the genre so special.

Create Your Perfect Character!

Choose from three classes - The Brute, The Ranger, or The Wizard - and shape your character to your liking. Allocate stat points, spend passive points on class trees, and upgrade skills to create unique builds. And don't worry about mistakes - all aspects of your character can be reset and redistributed for free, allowing for endless experimentation.

Conquer Hordes of Monsters!

Explore randomly generated dungeon maps teeming with enemies, loot, and events. Encounter diverse monsters with randomized traits and defeat them to claim their loot. From common foes to legendary creatures, there's always a new challenge to overcome.

Descend into the Infinite Dungeon!

Once you've cleared a dungeon, choose to return to town or delve deeper into the Infinite Dungeon. With randomized mods applied to each floor, the challenge increases but so do the rewards. How far can you go?

More Exciting Updates to Come!

Another Dungeon Game is developed by a passionate solo developer who values player feedback. Expect more character classes, enemy types, events, and encounters in future updates. No microtransactions, cash shop, or planned DLC expansions - all updates are free for the community.

Features to Look Forward To:

  • More character classes
  • More base enemy types
  • New events and encounters in dungeons
  • Improved quest system
  • Expanded customization options
  • Epic boss fights
  • Main story quest
  • Item crafting

Get ready to embark on a thrilling and accessible journey into the world of ]Another Dungeon Game! Dive into the depths of the dungeon, conquer challenges, and uncover epic loot as you forge your own path to victory!
